# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(AMRTest_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(AMRTest)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
AMRTestPluginInfo.C
AMRTestCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
AMRTestPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
AMRTestMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAMRTestFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
AMRTestEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAMRTestFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IAMRTestDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IAMRTestDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IAMRTestDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MAMRTestDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MAMRTestDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MAMRTestDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MAMRTestDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EAMRTestDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAMRTestDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAMRTestDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAMRTestDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EAMRTestDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAMRTestDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAMRTestDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAMRTestDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases AMRTest ${INSTALLTARGETS})
